alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Beaches; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Ventura County Beaches (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued May 06 at 1:57PM PDT until May 08 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerous rip currents and breaking waves due to elevated surf expected. * WHERE...San Luis Obispo County Beaches, Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches and Ventura County Beaches. * WHEN...Through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...There is an increased risk of ocean drowning. Rip currents can pull swimmers and surfers out to sea. Waves can wash people off beaches and rocks, and capsize small boats nearshore. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High surf may develop by late in the weekend, and a High Surf Advisory may be needed for west- facing beaches.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water due to hazardous swimming conditions, or stay near occupied lifeguard towers. Rock jetties can be deadly in such conditions, stay off the rocks.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Beaches; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Ventura County Beaches
